name: Young Women Rising / Rising Voices
description: WRRV is a women-led program providing comprehensive, gender-responsive, developmentally- and culturally-appropriate services to support young women's successful transition back into community and adulthood and reduce recidivism. Rising Voices, is an arts-based theater component that allows clients to express themselves for further healing and self-reflection. Incorporating the principles of restorative justice, their theater programs create a safe space for clients to process their life experien
